mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.devicename, d.devicename AS label, d.devicename AS text, d.`id` AS `value`, d.id_device_group, d.id_device_type, d.datatablename, d.view_tablename FROM device d WHERE d.id_site = #{id_site} AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND d.id_device_type IN (1, 3, 15, 12, 9) GROUP BY d.id

SELECT dp.id, dp.slug, dp.`name`, dp.`name` AS label, dp.`name` AS text, dp.`id` AS `value`, d.id_device_group FROM device d LEFT JOIN device_group dg ON d.id_device_group = dg.id LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp ON dg.id = dp.id_device_group WHERE d.id_site = #{id_site} AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND d.id_device_type NOT IN (12,5,10,11,4) GROUP BY dp.id

SELECT dg.id, dg.group_name AS label, dg.group_name AS text, dg.id AS `value`, dg.table_name, dg.view_tablename, dg.job_tablename FROM device d LEFT JOIN device_group dg ON dg.id = d.id_device_group WHERE d.id_site = #{id_site} AND d.`status` = 1 AND d.is_delete = 0 AND d.id_device_type NOT IN (12,5,10,11,4) GROUP BY dg.id
SELECT t.*, t.name AS text, t.name AS label, t.id AS value FROM widget_group AS t WHERE t.`status` = 1 AND id_site = #{id_site} ORDER BY id, parent, menu_order DESC;
SELECT t.*, dp.id_device_group FROM widget_group_parameter t LEFT JOIN device_parameters dp ON dp.id = t.id_group_parameter WHERE t.id_widget_group = #{id} ORDER BY t.menu_order DESC;
SELECT t.*, t.name AS text, t.name AS label, t.id AS value FROM widget_group AS t WHERE t.`status` = 1 AND `parent` = 0 OR `parent` IS NULL ORDER BY `name` ASC;

INSERT INTO `widget_group`( `name`, `description`, `id_site`, `parent`, `bg_color`, `menu_order`, `type`, `unit` )VALUES( #{name}, #{description}, #{id_site}, #{parent}, #{bg_color}, #{menu_order}, #{type}, #{unit} );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id

INSERT INTO `widget_group_parameter`( `id_widget_group`, `id_group_parameter`, `name`, `value`, `bg_color`, `menu_order`, `unit`, `formula`, `type`, `id_device` )VALUES( #{id_widget_group}, #{id_group_parameter}, #{name}, #{value}, #{bg_color}, #{menu_order}, #{unit}, #{formula}, #{type}, #{id_device} );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id

INSERT INTO `leviton_virtual_meter_parameter`( `id_device`, `id_device_parameter`, `id_device_parameter_map`, `slug`, `name`, `unit`, `formula`, `id_site`, `enable_for_report` )VALUES( #{id_device}, #{id_device_parameter}, #{id_device_parameter_map}, #{slug}, #{name}, #{unit}, #{formula}, #{id_site}, #{enable_for_report} );
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
